title: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Unlock your creativity and learn to write compelling stories and essays in English.
info:
Course Info

Moving beyond basic sentences, this course explores how to paint pictures with words. We focus on the golden rule of writing: Show, Don't Tell.

quiz.question: Which sentence uses 'Show, Don't Tell'?

options.text: He slammed the door and clenched his fists.

quiz.correctFeedback: Correct! Slamming a door describes the action of anger without simply stating the emotion.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: The other options just state the emotion directly ('telling').
